reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 895: AMOUNT-CLAUSE 2 (2) (A) OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 895: AMOUNT-CLAUSE 2 (2) (A) OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Ontario Pensioners Property Tax Assistance Act   Loi sur l’allégement de l’impôt foncier des retraités de l’Ontario

content.content: 1. In lieu of the amount set out in clause 2 (2) (a) of the Act, the prescribed amount is $600. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 895, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. In lieu of the amount set out in clause 2 (2) (a) of the Act, the prescribed amount is $600. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 895, s. 1.
